title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Jumanji
overview: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

title: Grumpier Old Men
overview: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

title: Waiting to Exhale
overview: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

title: Father of the Bride Part II
overview: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.

title: Heat
overview: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

title: Sabrina
overview: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

title: Tom and Huck
overview: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

title: Sudden Death
overview: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

title: GoldenEye
overview: When a powerful secret defense system is stolen, James Bond is assigned to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using it.

title: The American President
overview: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

title: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
overview: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

title: Balto
overview: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

title: Nixon
overview: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

title: Cutthroat Island
overview: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

title: Casino
overview: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: Sense and Sensibility
overview: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The older two daughters are the title opposites.

title: Four Rooms
overview: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
overview: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: Money Train
overview: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

title: Get Shorty
overview: A mobster travels from Florida to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is just as sleazy as the Miami underworld.

title: Copycat
overview: A criminal psychologist who turned agoraphobic after a murder attempt agrees to help two San Francisco detectives hunt for a copycat serial killer who intends on making her his next victim.

title: Assassins
overview: Professional hit-man Robert Rath wants to fulfill a few more contracts before retiring but unscrupulous ambitious newcomer hit-man Miguel Bain keeps killing Rath's targets.

title: Powder
overview: An off-the-charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

title: Leaving Las Vegas
overview: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

title: Othello
overview: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio, when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

title: Now and Then
overview: Four childhood friends gather together to prepare for the birth of Chrissey's baby. They wonder how the girls they were at 12 years could possibly have become the women they are now.

title: Persuasion
overview: Theatrical film of Persuasion with Ciaran Hinds & Amanda Root. Directed by Roger Michell.

title: The City of Lost Children
overview: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

title: Shanghai Triad
overview: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

title: Dangerous Minds
overview: LouAnne, a retired US marine, becomes a teacher in a Californian high school. But her mostly Latino and black students from an impoverished and racially segregated locality do not easily embrace her.

title: 12 Monkeys
overview: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

title: Babe
overview: Gentle farmer Arthur Hoggett wins a piglet Babe at a county fair. Narrowly escaping his fate as Christmas dinner, Babe bonds with motherly border collie Fly and discovers that he too can herd sheep. But will the other animals acce...

title: Dead Man Walking
overview: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

title: It Takes Two
overview: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

title: Clueless
overview: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

title: Cry, the Beloved Country
overview: A South African preacher goes to search for his wayward son, who has committed a crime in the big city.

title: Richard III
overview: The classic Shakespearean play about the murderously scheming 15th-century king is reimagined in an alternative setting of 1930s England as clouds of fascism gather.

title: Dead Presidents
overview: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

title: Restoration
overview: The exiled royal doctor to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

title: Mortal Kombat
overview: Three martial artists are forced to battle demonic adversaries in another dimension with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

title: To Die For
overview: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

title: How to Make an American Quilt
overview: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Pocahontas
overview: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

title: When Night Is Falling
overview: An uptight and conservative woman, working on tenure as a literacy professor at a large urban university, finds herself strangely attracted to a free-spirited, liberal woman who works at a local carnival that comes to town.

title: The Usual Suspects
overview: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Mighty Aphrodite
overview: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

title: Lamerica
overview: Immediately after the fall of communism in Albania, two Italians go there to embezzle investment money by creating a fake company. As the chairman/fall guy, they pick a former political prisoner who turns out to be more than meets...

title: The Big Green
overview: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.

title: Georgia
overview: Sadie is desperately looking up to her older sister Georgia who is a famous C&W artist. Her desperate need to be accepted by her sister is constantly complicated by her drug and alcohol problems.

title: Home for the Holidays
overview: After being fired, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and discovering that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces the unenviable task of spending the holiday with her exceedingly dul...

title: The Postman
overview: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

title: The Indian in the Cupboard
overview: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cupboard from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother, and a plastic Indian from his best friend, Patrick.

title: Eye for an Eye
overview: When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.

title: Mr. Holland's Opus
overview: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
overview: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).

title: Two If by Sea
overview: A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract and manage to evade the police. The sale takes place four days later on an island, but things don't go as planned.

title: Bio-Dome
overview: Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.

title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
overview: They thought they had destroyed him, but the simple gardener-turned-superkiller has found a way to reboot himself in Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace.

title: French Twist
overview: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

title: Friday
overview: It's Friday, and Craig and Smokey must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
overview: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

title: Fair Game
overview: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

title: Kicking and Screaming
overview: A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.

title: Les Misérables
overview: A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.

title: Bed of Roses
overview: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.

title: Big Bully
overview: A writer returns to his hometown where he faces the childhood nemesis whose life he ultimately ruined, only the bully wants to relive their painful past by torturing him once again.

title: Screamers
overview: A military commander stationed off planet during an interplanetary war travels through the devastated landscape to negotiate a peace treaty, but discovers that the primitive robots they built to kill enemy combatants have gained s...

title: Nico Icon
overview: A look into the many lives of Christa Päffgen, otherwise known as Nico; from cutie German mädchen to the first of the supermodels, to glamorous diva of the Velvet Underground, to cult item, junkie and hag. Many faces for the same ...

title: The Crossing Guard
overview: Freddy Gale is a seedy jeweller who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.

title: The Juror
overview: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced by a compulsive mob enforcer to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty.

title: The White Balloon
overview: Several people try to help a little girl to find the money her mom gave her to buy a goldfish with.

title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
overview: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

title: Antonia's Line
overview: A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.

title: Once Upon a Time... When We Were Colored
overview: A narrator tells the story of his childhood years in a tightly knit Afro-American community in the deep south under racial segregation.

title: Angels and Insects
overview: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.

title: White Squall
overview: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

title: Dunston Checks In
overview: A young boy befriends a larcenous orangutan in a luxury hotel.

title: Black Sheep
overview: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

title: Nick of Time
overview: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

title: Mary Reilly
overview: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

title: Vampire in Brooklyn
overview: A Caribbean vampire seduces a Brooklyn police officer who has no idea that she is half-vampire.

title: Beautiful Girls
overview: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

title: Broken Arrow
overview: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

title: A Midwinter's Tale
overview: A group of theatre actors plays "Hamlet" in a provincial village, faced with their own temptations, disappointments, and joys.

title: La haine
overview: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: Heidi Fleiss: Hollywood Madam
overview: A documentary crew from the BBC arrives in L.A. intent on interviewing Heidi Fleiss, a year after her arrest for running a brothel but before her trial. Several months elapse before the interview, so the crew searches for anyone w...

title: City Hall
overview: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

title: Bottle Rocket
overview: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

title: Mr. Wrong
overview: A lonely single woman finds the seemingly-perfect man to date, but soon regrets it when his deranged, possessive other personality emerges and she cannot convince anyone else of his Jekyll-and-Hyde true nature.

title: Unforgettable
overview: A Seattle medical examiner uses an experimental memory transference drug to unravel the mystery surrounding his wife's brutal murder.

title: Happy Gilmore
overview: After his grandmother's house is repossessed by the IRS, a bad tempered hockey player takes his talents to golf to earn the big bucks and get his grandmothers house back.

title: The Bridges of Madison County
overview: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

title: Nobody Loves Me
overview: On the brink of her 30th birthday, Fanny feels the door to marital happiness closing on her. She is obsessed with death and even visits evening classes on dying, so it seems fitting that she encounters a skeleton in the malfunctio...

title: Muppet Treasure Island
overview: The Muppets set sail in search of treasure, with Jim Hawkins and Long John Silver.

title: Catwalk
overview: A camera follows model Christy Turlington through the spring fashion shows in Milan, Paris, and New York in 1994. She and others dash from one designer's unveilings to another. Extended footage looks at Versace and Armani in Milan...

title: Braveheart
overview: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Taxi Driver
overview: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: Rumble in the Bronx
overview: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.
